attributes.action: STOP IN WORK POVERTY WITH A PROGRESSIVE TAXATION SYSTEM!
attributes.additional_details:
National Minimum Wage working 40 hours over 5 day will pay £15600 per year. 

The current 3 step tax rate system causes in work poverty and income inequality. 

A fairer system will benefit everyone.
attributes.background:
A progressive taxation system will reduce income inequality and promote real social justice.

The Joseph Rowntree Foundation produced a detailed report stating that for a single person to achieve the minimum standard of living in the UK they would need to earn £17900 per year before tax.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what how you would like the tax system to work.
